description: Adds a bot or server to the partner system
usage: {emotes.use} | Use {prefix}setpartner <server id/bot id> <server invite/bot invite> <short description>
usageHelp: setpartner <server id/bot id> <server invite/bot invite> <short description>
onlyBotsAndServers: {emotes.error} | Only bots and servers can be entered in the partner system
botAlreadyAdded: {emotes.error} | The bot {username} is already registered in the partner system
botAdded: {emotes.success} | The bot {username} is now registered in the partner system
botAddedAnnounce:
{emotes.raven} | We are now in a partnership with [{username}]({invite})! You can invite him with this link: [Just click]({invite})
{emotes.raven} | {text}
guildAlreadyAdded: {emotes.error} | The server {guildname} is already registered in the partner system
guildAdded: {emotes.success} | The server {guildname} is now registered in the partner system
guildAddedAnnounce:
{emotes.raven} | We are now in a partnership with [{guildname}]({invite})! With this link you can join the server: [Just click]({invite})
{emotes.raven} | {text}
